Remediations.Description: Get Xbox Game Pass Standard today to take advantage of a catalog of hundreds of high-quality games, online console multiplayer, and exclusive deals.
With Xbox Game Pass, you can play more great games anytime.
With Game Pass, you can play more great games anytime.

Affirmations.Description: with your Xbox Game Pass Standard membership.
with your Xbox Game Pass membership

LocalizedProperties.ProductDescription:
It’s In Our Blood!

Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat™ Universe created by the Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat™ 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and fatalities!
LocalizedProperties.ShortDescription: Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat™ Universe created by the Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat™ 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and fatalities!

LocalizedProperties.SkuDescription:
It’s In Our Blood!

Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat™ Universe created by the Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat™ 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and fatalities!

HardwareProperties.MinimumProcessor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 | AMD Ryzen™ 3 3100 or Ryzen™ 5 2600
HardwareProperties.MinimumGraphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ RX 590 or Intel® Arc™ A750
HardwareProperties.RecommendedGraphics: Nvidia GeForce® RTX 2080 Ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT or Intel® Arc™ A770
